[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thematic/core](./core.md) &gt; [ThemeDefinition](./core.themedefinition.md)

## ThemeDefinition interface

This is the complete instantiated mapping of a ThemeSpec from input parameters to definitions. Note the spec includes the light and dark variants, the definition is an instance of one as requested during load.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ThemeDefinition 
```
